title: Lost Daughters
description: "Micky Knight is a to-die-for creation . . . a Cajun firebrand with the proverbial quick wit, fast tongue and heavy heart."- Lambda Book Report "One of the most hard-boiled and complex female detectives in print today."- San Francisco Chronicle Micky takes on the cases of a widowed mother looking for her daughter and a tough gay boy hunting for his biological mother. Together they stir in Micky a desire to search for her own mother, who abandoned her when she was a young girl. First paperback edition of a W. W. Norton hardcover original. J. M. Redmann grew up in coastal Mississippi, headed north and graduated from Vassar and has been living in New Orleans for the past 15 years.
author: J.M. Redmann
